What does the word Quran mean?: The word Quran means a recitation
What does the word surah mean?: The word surah means the outer walls of a city
What does the word ayah mean?: The word ayah means a sign
What is the first surah of the Quran?: Surah Al Fatihah is the first surah of the Quran
Where was Surah Al Fatihah revealed?: Surah Al Fatihah was revealed in Makkah
How many ayat are in Surah Al Fatihah?: There are 7 ayat in Surah Al Fatihah
What is the first ayah of Surah Al Fatih: The first ayah of Surah Al Fatihah is ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
What does the first ayah of Surah Al Fat: The first ayah of Surah Al Fatihah means All praise and thanks is for Allah The Master of all nations and people
What is the second ayah of Surah Al Fati: The second ayah of Surah Al Fatihah is ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
What does the second ayah of Surah Al Fa: The second ayah of Surah Al Fatihah means The extremely loving the always loving
What is the third ayah of Surah Al Fatih: The third ayah of Surah Al Fatihah is مَـٰلِكِ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
What does the third ayah of Surah Al Fat: The third ayah of Surah Al Fatihah means The Master of the Day of Judgment
What is the fourth ayah of Surah Al Fati: The fourth ayah of Surah Al Fatihah is إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ
What does the fourth ayah of Surah Al Fa: The fourth ayah of Surah Al Fatihah means You alone we worship and You alone we ask for help
What is the fifth ayah of Surah Al Fatih: The fifth ayah of Surah Al Fatihah is ٱهْدِنَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
What does the fifth ayah of Surah Al Fat: The fifth ayah of Surah Al Fatihah means Guide us to the upright stright path
What is the sixth ayah of Surah Al Fatih: The sixth ayah of Surah Al Fatihah is صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ
What does the sixth ayah of Surah Al Fat: The sixth ayah of Surah Al Fatihah means The path of those upon whom You have favored
What is the seventh ayah of Surah Al Fat: The seventh ayah of Surah Al Fatihah is غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
What does the seventh ayah of Surah Al F: The seventh ayah of Surah Al Fatihah means But not of those who have wrath upon and not those who are lost
What is the second surah of the Quran?: The second surah of the Quran is Surah Al Baqarah
Where was Surah Al Baqarah revealed: Surah Al Baqarah was revealed in Madinah?
How many ayat are in Surah Al Baqarah?: There are 286 ayat in Surah Al Baqarah
What is the first ayah of Surah Al Baqar: The first ayah of Surah Al Baqarah is الٓمٓ ١
What does Alif Laam Meem mean?: No one knows the meaning of Alif Laam Meem, only Allah knows its meaning
